text.title: a week in sicily
text.p: [Music]
[Music]
[Music]
[Music]
you
[Music]
we just found the beach we just walked
for like 2 minutes from our apartment I
don't know if this is like a secret
entrance and it's so cute
[Music]
[Music]
we met two of our followers they stopped
us to say hi and they were so sweet we
ended up chatting for almost an hour
they were giving us some really good
recommendations around this town and
also just places around the area that we
need to visit but we are going to go and
have some pizza for dinner we're going
to be trying sister San pizzas for the
first time sounds so good oh I'm excited
[Music]
what's
[Music]
good good morning we are getting ready
to go to the beach I need to pack my bag
I'm going to bring some books we bought
some watercolors and a Sketchbook so we
can have really good quality time and
just take the time to fully relax and
recharge I don't want to spend time on
my phone or anything I really want to
fully relax because we've been quite
busy the last couple of weeks and even
just this summer has been quite busy I
am just so ready to take some time off
and relax so let's go pack our bags and
go to the beach
[Music]
[Applause]
oh my goodness this feels like a
paradise it's so peaceful and quiet here
there not a lot of people here and I
think it's mostly Italians who live in
this town we were a bit worried that we
were not going to get a spot because it
was already like 11 but we got the
perfect spot here and we've just been
laying in the Sun going into the water
and it's the perfect temperature it's
not too warm it's not too cold and also
the waves aren't very strong so you can
kind of just chill yeah in the water so
nice I think I'm going to bring my book
into the water and just sit there and
read because it's very warm when you sit
like directly in the sun now we're under
the umbrella but oh my goodness this is
amazing I feel so good here
[Music]
I am going back to the apartment to make
some lunch for us we bought some chapata
and pruto tomatoes mozzarella so I'm
going to go and make a sandwich for us
so we can eat at the beach
[Music]
just got out of the shower after at the
beach and I feel amazing you know the
feeling when you've been out in the sun
the whole day and then you take a shower
to get all of the sand that's like stuck
in between everywhere on your body the
beach that we went to this morning was
so nice it was super private and quiet
but the only downside is that the Sun
goes behind some trees so there's just
going to be Shadow like after 3:00 so we
had to move to like a little bit more of
a public beach but it's the same Beach
essentially but there they were playing
quite loud music and there were more
people there so we definitely preferred
the beach in the morning but it was
super nice
overall anyways we are going to make
dinner at home we went to the
supermarket the day before yesterday and
they had some Del delicious yellow
cherry tomatoes and I just had to buy
them and we wanted to make a recipe that
my mom used to make it's a super easy
recipe you just cook the tomatoes on a
pan until they're soft it's basically
like a Pomodoro but with yellow tomatoes
and then you put some spaghetti and
Parmesan yeah super easy and I'm really
excited it's like super simple but super
super yummy
[Music]
[Music]
how does the pasta
taste perfect
literally perfect we've been making this
pasta dish a couple of times at home in
Copenhagen but I have to say this is
definitely the best one and it's
probably because we are in Italy we have
the best ingredients here and we nailed
the pasta it's perfect it's Al Dente
chef's kiss and then we are enjoying our
Sicilian white wine it's very
interesting it's quite different from
anything I've
tasted
[Music]
cheers good morning guys we are going to
go have some breakfast we are really
cing some couson and kabino so we are
going to try and find a nice breakfast
spot
[Music]
was good to get into the car and turn on
the AC because it is so warm outside we
wanted to drive to a ceramic store we're
not sure if it's open because you can't
find it on Google Maps so you can't see
any opening hours or anything you can
only see like a location we don't even
know the name of the ceramic market so
it's going to be a surprise if it's open
but we're at least on our way there now
[Music]
oh my goodness there's so many beautiful
ceramic pieces here I'm very tempted to
buy a few but we don't really have the
space in our suitcase because we really
filled up our suitcases but I think
we're going to make it worse you know I
think we need to buy something as a
souvenir from this trip so let's see
what we'll find
[Music]
we stopped at this place where you could
get a panoramic view over the town so
insanely beautiful and now we are kind
of driving back home because we decided
on going to like a beach that is
actually in the other direction but we
wanted to pick up some swimsuits and I
think we're going to go to the
supermarket to buy some snacks and maybe
some lunch that we can bring to the
[Music]
[Music]
beach according to Google Maps it takes
about 20 minutes to walk to the beach
and somebody recommended to bring hiking
shoes so I'm going to switch to my
hocus don't I look stylish with my hocus
[Music]
on it's a bit tricky getting to the
beach but it's completely possible you
just need a little bit of hiking skills
[Music]
I made some sandwiches we bought this
Panini bread and I put some butter and
salami this one is so good I think it's
even better than Sun pelino yeah it's
really good
we are so happy that we decided to come
to this beach it's the perfect Beach to
spend your afternoon because the Sun is
setting in this direction
[Music]
we are back home from the beach and we
are currently making dinner we're going
to be making kacho a Pepe we were
actually going to make a different type
of pasta dish with petta but I think the
guy from the supermarket sold us the
wrong type of ham so we are going to
improvise and we are going to make kacho
a Pepe instead I think we have all of
the ingredients and we are are going to
be using a pretty funky pasta shape it's
called Regan it looks like this I love
funky pasta shapes it just makes the
dish a bit more satisfying in a way
[Music]
[Music]
[Music]
[Music]
it's a bit cloudy today it seems like
and we are going on a road trip today I
hope it's going to clear up a bit
because we are visiting such a beautiful
place today it's called tonara d scell
it's a historical tuna fishery now it's
like a museum and kind of like a bathing
area I also think it's a hotel it's like
a must visit place if you are in this
area we've heard some really great
things about this place so we have
booked tickets for today and it's super
typical that it's a bit cloudy today but
I hope it's going to be fine
[Music]
we are out of the house and ready to go
to to scopello but before we go on our
road trip we actually wanted to try a
sicilian breakfast even though we've had
breakfast but this is more like a
dessert breakfast it's basically like a
Brio bun with ice cream it's a big
tradition here so we really want to give
it a try I think I'm going to love it
because I love bios and I love ice cream
so let's see how the combination is
[Music]
we chose pistachio ice cream because
it's our favorite but I think that
sorbet may be a bit more traditional
with this dish but I'm not sure but we
just wanted to pick our favorite ice
cream and then we have the Brio looks
amazing and I think you rip the top off
and then scoop the ice cream into the
Brio okay very
[Music]
excited it's good mhm very good it's a
funny combination but it definitely
works
[Music]
we brought swimming goggles and we've
been swimming in the water it is crystal
clear and there are so many fishes here
they're so cute so we've been having a
blast swimming in the
[Music]
water ch ch
J we are back in the car we spent a few
hours at ton what was the name
taraella Della and it was absolutely
beautiful there especially when you we
were walking down and you could see the
water The Cliffs it was incredible but
to be honest it was pretty crowded there
so it didn't feel as special there were
a lot of sun BS just like next to each
other and it just didn't feel as like
natural and kind of exclusive because
there were just so many people there and
it was even hard to get a picture
because it was filled with people yeah
and we also went to the museum but we
weren't allowed to film in there but the
museum was actually very interesting it
just got a little tour around the
history and the area where the fishermen
worked and so the fishermen were
specializing in catching tuna fish and
the techniques of getting the fish or
fishing the fish was actually very
interesting and cool mhm but yeah now
it's a hotel and a museum and a bathing
area it was breathtaking but I don't
know I preferred the beach that we went
to yesterday way more hidden and
exclusive not a lot of people there but
it's an experience to come here and we
got some beautiful pictures and we yeah
it was fun MH but now we are going to
explore the scopello town or the town of
scopello it's a very small town yeah the
couple that we met on the first day they
said it took like maybe 20 minutes to
walk around the whole town or something
so it's very small but I mean there are
some restaurants and yeah we're going to
take a quick tour get something to eat
maybe I think we're going to have dinner
there maybe maybe have some seafood I
would love to have pasta vanola it's the
one with clams I think and spaghetti
spaghetti spaghetti
spaghetti I said it very Icelandic
spaghetti
[Music]
